readable.title: 141139674_246c0f90a1
readable.content: A boy hits a baseball with the bat . A boy swings a baseball bat , and a catcher stands behind him . A kid hits a baseball during a game . A little boy in a teal uniform swinging a baseball bat . The boy in the blue shirt is swinging a baseball bat towards a ball as the boy in the red helmet waits to catch him out .
